text: Luis Enrique Del Pino Mago (born 19 November 1994) is a Venezuelan footballer who plays as a centre back for Chilean Primera División side Universidad de Chile. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Venezuela's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:100%;" !
